title: I can't connect to champ select.
body: For a few days now whenever I accept a match and we go into champ select the client just remains black.  And it stays black for a long time.  Especially that this weekend is urf.  I get in champ select after a whole minute of waiting  and only have 10 seconds to see my champ, adjust runes and masteries, see if someone wants to trade or reroll.  What the crap is this?

replies.body: This is something we've been investigating further.  We've found that a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) has been able to resolve this for players until we have a more permanent fix.  I hope that helps!
